Articles.Content: I played for around 6 hours last night and lost all progress when I closed down amid a mission. The mission itself was only about 15-20 minutes long. I'd completed several others over the course of that time. When I re-entered the game I discovered that the persistent save hadn't updated since 6 hours prior despite many times leaving and re-entering the the space center which I thought was supposed to prompt an update of the persistent save. Have persistent saves changed or is this an error or failure to save?

Persistent saves have not changed and KSP should update the persistent.sfs periodically, also on exit to the space centre.

Please upload your game logs and settings.cfg Maelstrom Vortex, see the support stickies for details on finding these and how to post them.
